workflow.name: Discover buying-intent leads on Twitter and Instagram with GPT-4o-mini and send summaries to Slack and Notion
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automate B2B lead discovery by identifying high-intent prospects directly from Reddit discussions using AI-powered intent analysis. üéØü§ñ This workflow scans Reddit for conversations related to CRM and marketing automation tools, analyzes snippets to detect buying intent, identifies relevant decision-makers on LinkedIn, enriches contact details via RocketReach, and logs qualified leads into Google Sheets. Running every three hours, it ensures your sales team never misses fresh outbound opportunities without manual research. üöÄüìä

## üîÅ What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Runs automatically every 3 hours to search Reddit for tool-related discussions. ‚è∞
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Extracts Reddit snippets, links, and highlighted keywords from search results. üîç
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Uses AI to classify buying intent as High, Medium, or Low. ü§ñ
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Identifies the core problem and suggests a safe, non-salesy outreach angle. üí¨
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Filters only High and Medium intent opportunities. üö¶
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Searches LinkedIn for matching decision-makers based on role and seniority. üë•
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Enriches lead profiles with emails and company data using RocketReach. üìá
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Saves qualified leads into Google Sheets with deduplication logic. üìä
 9Ô∏è‚É£ Sends Slack alerts when enrichment fails or API limits are hit. üö®
 üîü Sends Gmail alerts if any workflow error occurs. ‚úâÔ∏è

## ‚≠ê Key Benefits
‚úÖ Discovers real buying intent directly from public Reddit discussions
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual lead research and qualification
 ‚úÖ Uses AI for consistent, conservative intent classification
 ‚úÖ Enriches leads with verified contact data automatically
 ‚úÖ Builds a clean, ready-to-use outbound lead list in Google Sheets
 ‚úÖ Runs continuously to capture fresh opportunities

## üß© Features
Scheduled Reddit monitoring via SerpAPI
AI-based intent detection using GPT-4o-mini
Conservative intent scoring to avoid false positives
LinkedIn decision-maker discovery
RocketReach contact enrichment
Google Sheets lead storage with update logic
Slack alerts for API and enrichment issues
Gmail-based error notifications
Scalable batch processing

## üîê Requirements
OpenAI API key (GPT-4o-mini)
SerpAPI API key
RocketReach API key
Google Sheets OAuth2 credentials
Slack API credentials
Gmail OAuth2 credentials

## üéØ Target Audience
B2B sales and outbound teams
Growth and demand-generation teams
Lead generation agencies
SaaS founders targeting niche audiences
RevOps teams automating prospect research

workflow.name: Identify Buying-Intent Leads on Twitter & Instagram using GPT-4o-mini with Slack Alerts and Notion CRM

nodes.name: Receive User Lead Discovery Query (Chat Trigger)
Discover Buying-Intent Leads from Social Platforms (AI)

options.systemMessage:
You are a lead generation agent.

Your job:
1. Search Twitter and Instagram for posts where users:
   - ask for tools
   - ask for recommendations
   - complain about problems
2. Extract only real buying-intent posts.
3. For each lead, return:
   - platform (Twitter / Instagram)
   - username
   - post text
   - problem summary
   - buying intent (Low / Medium / High)
4. Ignore spam, ads, or promotions.
5. If no leads found, clearly say "No qualified leads found".
Final output must be clean, structured, and ready for CRM.
Use bullet points.

nodes.name: External Social Search & Enrichment Tool (MCP Client)
LLM Reasoning Engine for Lead Qualification
Generate Slack & Notion Lead Insight Summary (AI)

parameters.text:
=User search query:
{{ $('Receive User Lead Discovery Query (Chat Trigger)').item.json.chatInput }}

Here are the qualified leads:
{{ JSON.stringify($json.leads || $input.all().map(i => i.json), null, 2) }}

Create:
1. A Slack summary
2. A Notion database entry

options.systemMessage:
=You are a lead generation automation assistant.

Your task:
1. Analyze social media leads (Twitter and Instagram).
2. Generate TWO outputs:
   - A Slack summary for humans
   - A Notion-ready entry for database storage

Rules:
- Slack summary must explain:
  ‚Ä¢ What the user searched for
  ‚Ä¢ How many leads were found
  ‚Ä¢ High-level intent insights
- Notion text must be:
  ‚Ä¢ Very concise
  ‚Ä¢ Structured
  ‚Ä¢ Easy to store as database text
- Do NOT add emojis in Notion output
- Do NOT use markdown tables
- Output must be valid JSON only


You must return ONLY valid JSON.
Do not include markdown.
Do not include explanations.
Do not assume any domain.
Use neutral, generic language.
If data is missing, use empty strings or zero values.
Follow the output schema exactly.

nodes.name: LLM Reasoning Engine for Insight Structuring
Enforce Structured Lead Insight Output Schema
Send Lead Discovery Summary to Slack
Store Lead Discovery Insight in Notion CRM

parameters.message: =üö® *Workflow Error Alert*  *Error Node:* {{ $json.node.name }} *Error Message:* {{ $json.error.message }} *Timestamp:* {{ $now.toISO() }}  Please investigate immediately.
parameters.subject: Workflow Error Alert

parameters.content:
## Error Handling
Sends alerts when the workflow fails

## üîé Identify Buying-Intent Leads on Twitter & Instagram using GPT-4o-mini with Slack Alerts and Notion CRM

### How it works
This workflow enables on-demand lead discovery from social platforms using a chat-based interface.
When a user submits a lead discovery query, the workflow triggers an AI agent that searches Twitter
and Instagram for posts where people are asking for tools, recommendations, or help solving real
problems.

An external MCP-powered social search tool is used to retrieve relevant posts. The AI agent then
filters out spam, ads, and promotional content, keeping only genuine buying-intent signals. For
each qualified lead, the agent extracts the platform, username, post text, problem summary, and
classifies buying intent as Low, Medium, or High.

The workflow maintains short-term conversation memory to improve relevance across follow-up
queries. Once leads are identified, a second AI step converts the raw results into two outputs:
a human-readable Slack summary and a structured, CRM-ready record for Notion.

This automation eliminates manual social scanning and ensures sales or growth teams receive
clean, structured, and actionable lead intelligence in real time.

### Setup steps
1. Connect Azure OpenAI credentials
2. Configure MCP bearer authentication for social search
3. Connect Slack and Notion credentials
4. Enable the chat trigger
5. Test with a sample query before sharing with users

### Customization
- Adjust intent classification rules in the AI prompt  
- Change output structure for different CRM schemas  
- Extend to additional social platforms via MCP tools

## User Input & Context
Receives user lead queries and maintains short-term conversation memory

## Social Search & Enrichment
Fetches and enriches social posts from external platforms

## Distribution & CRM Storage
Delivers insights to Slack and stores them in Notion

## Insight Structuring & Validation
Transforms raw leads into structured, validated insight

## AI Lead Discovery & Qualification
Identifies real buying-intent leads and classifies intent

## CRM-Ready Response Preparation
Converts discovered leads into a clean, user-facing response

## üé• Workflow Demo Video

Watch a short walkthrough explaining:
‚Ä¢ What this automation does  
‚Ä¢ How the data flows  
‚Ä¢ How to set up credentials  
‚Ä¢ Common mistakes to avoid  

@[youtube](pj4GfvdUa6k)

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.
